item.description:
Voted as Best Restaurant five years in a row, Radius is a fan favorite. Prefix menu, three course for $33, last day of restaurant week. I only managed to book a table for five.
From critic: Radius is a stylish, urban restaurant in a playful sophisticated setting serving Modern French cuisine. This lighter style of cuisine is marked by an emphasis on seasonal ingredients, classical technique and the use of flavored oils, emulsions, juices and reductions.

Location: 8 High Street Boston, MA 02110 Only 10 minutes walk from South Station.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Girl's night out at Radius Restaurant Week Aug 24 Friday 5:30PM
